mapper.select: SELECT t.* from ( SELECT * FROM t_file where user_id =#{cardUserId} ORDER BY create_time DESC ) t WHERE rownum = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_file ( file_id, idcard, user_name, file_name, file_type, file_size, file_path, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
(SEQ_FILE_ID.nextval,#{item.idcard},#{item.userName},#{item.fileName},#{item.fileType},#{item.fileSize},#{item.filePath},#{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

INSERT INTO t_file ( file_id, idcard, user_name, file_name, file_type, file_size, file_path, create_time, update_time ) VALUES( SEQ_FILE_ID.nextval, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}ï¼Œ #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
